full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SMYUNG GNAS KYI CHO GA'I ZUR RGYAN BDE BA CAN GYI LAM YIG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039A *, ,(CES SMYUNG GNAS KYI CHO GA'I ZUR RGYAN BDE BA CAN GYI LAM YIG CES BYA BA 'DI NI  CHOS TSUL 'DI LA MCHOG TU MOS PA RAB 'BYAMS PA DKON MCHOG SMON LAM GYIS 'DI'I PHAN YON LO RGYUS BLANG DOR GYI LAG LEN DANG BCAS GSAL BAR BSTAN PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES LAN BCU GSUM GYI BAR NAN TAN DU BSKUL CING, DAD BRTZON BLO DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYAMS PA DKON MCHOG YE SHES KYIS THUGS RJE CHEN POS GTZOS PA'I BYA RGYUD KYI BSNYEN YIG DGOS TSUL SNGAR NAS @039B BSKUL BA DANG, YANG DGE SBYOR LA BRTZON PA'I RI KHROD PA DKON MCHOG LDAN GYIS PO BSTOD LA t'IKKA ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA RNAMS DON MTHUN PAR SNANG BAS PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDEBS TE ^ BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME BYI'I DGUN MTSAMS SKABS NYIN GUNG GI THUN GSENG LA SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA LAS SHOG BUR 'PHEBS PA PO NI SNGAGS RAM PA DKON MCHOG KUN DGA'O,, ,, ` AOm SVA STI, MNYAM MED GUNG THANG ZHABS KYIS RTZOM MDZAD PA'I, SMYUNG GNAS CHO GA'I ZUR RGYAN LEGS BSHAD 'DI, ,'PHAGS MCHOG SGRUB PAR 'DOD PA'I RNAM DPYOD CAN, ,SKAL LDAN GDUNG BYA RNAMS LA PHAN PA DANG, ,CHOS KYI SBYIN PA'I RGYUN MI 'CHAD PA'I PHYIR, ,DAD LDAN DGE SLONG RTA MGRIN LTOS BCAS KYIS, ,BDE LDAN @040A *, ,GLING DU PAR DU BSKRUN PA YI, ,RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I RTZA BA LA BRTEN TE, ,RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS, ,BSTAN 'DZIN DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS BRTAN CING, 'GRO BA KUN KYANG SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG GI ,GO 'PHANG MCHOG DE MYUR DU THOB GYUR CIG , ,,GNAS SKABS PHYI NANG BAR CHAD MA LUS ZHI, ,CHOS LDAN BYA BA MTHA' DAG YID BZHIN SGRUB, ,LUNG RTOGS YON TAN YAR NGO'I ZLA BA BZHIN, ,GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PA SHOG ,'PHAGS MCHOG THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I BYIN RLABS KYIS, ,BKRA SHIS GDANGS SNYAN SA STENG RAB 'GENGS TE, ,SGRIB GNYIS MA RUNGS NYER 'TSE RTZAD NAS ZHI, ,BDE LEGS CHEN POR 'DOD DGU SPYOD GYUR CIG , ,,SHU BHAm MASTU SARBA DZA GA TAm,, ,,)
